Todo List
Member BaseStat::attach (Entity *e)
remove this function. Not very OO, because it forces to use dynamic casts. By now it is deprecated. Substituted by addParticle() (see particle.hpp).
Member BaseStat::probe (Event *e)
remove this function. Not very OO, because it takes a generic event, and most of the times we must do a dynamic_cast<>. By now it is deprecated. Must be substituted by non-virtual probe methods that take the typed event object as parameters (see particle.hpp).
Member Event::addStat (BaseStat *actStat)
deprecated, will be removed, and substituted by a different kind of mechanisms.

Member Task::changeIAT (RandomVar *iat)
what happens to the existing iat variable? probably to be changed: the task is the owner of the variable, so it should be responsible for deletion. Therefore, we would simply return the period or minimum interarrival time, or just a copy of the random variable with another function. This function should not return anything.
